pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dash is an experimental new digital currency that enables anonymous, instant payments to anyone, anywhere in the world. Dash uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority: managing transactions and issuing money are carried out collectively by the network.

use.flag: Build the end-user Qt GUI for the Dash crypto-currency
Enable generation of QR Codes for receiving payments
Attempt to reduce exported symbols in the resulting executables
Use system univalue instead of the bundled one
Enable command-line client and transaction tool
Report blocks and transactions via zeromq
